ssot__ConvReasonReportSegmentDef__dlm.name: Conversation Reason Report Segment Def
ssot__ConvReasonReportSegmentDef__dlm.description: The Conversation Reason Report Segment Def DMO represents a segment definition of a conversation reason report.

ssot__ConvReasonReportDefinitionID__c.description: A reference ID to the report definition the segment belongs to.

ssot__ConvRsnRptSegmentTypeID__c.description: A reference ID to the segment type.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the conversation reason report segment definition DMO.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DateSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by the external record ID.

ssot__DateSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the conversation reason report segment definition.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the conversation reason report segment definition.

ssot__SegmentObjectName__c.description: The name of the segment object for the conversation reason report segment definition.

ssot__TargetObjectName__c.description: The name of the target object for the conversation reason report segment definition.
